titleStmt.title: The prerogative of man: or, The immortality of humane soules asserted against the vain cavils of a late worthlesse pamphlet, entituled, Mans mortality, &c. VVhereunto is added the said pamphlet it selfe.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.

notesStmt.note: A reissue of "The prerogative of man" (Wing P3220) and "Mans mortalitie" by Richard Overton (Amsterdam, printed by John Canne, 1644), with added general title page and contents leaf.
Imperfect: NNUT copy lacks Overton, Richard. Mans mortalitie.
Reproduction of the original at the Union Theological Seminary, Library, New York.
